DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study was investigated the cerebral tissue oxygenation index (c-TOI) measured by near infrared spectroscopy (NIRS)in the preterm infants with intracranial haemorrhagia.
DOC.brief_title: Measurement of Cerebral Oxygenation Using NIRS Method in the Preterm Infants With Intracranial Haemorrhagia
DOC.criteria: .<34 gestation week preterm infants with intracranial haemorrhagia sepsis NEC congenital abnormalities hydrocephalus intracranial infections
